task.title: Obtaining a report of meeting participants
task.shortdesc: A meeting moderator can generate a report of meeting participants. The report provides the time when participants enter and leave a meeting.

context.p: This feature is available, if the Sametime administrator enables the report policy. If not, the feature is not available in the user interface.
To generate a participant report, you must be in an active meeting and be a meeting moderator.

step.cmd: In the meeting, click the participant list icon ( ) to open the list of the meeting participants.
Click the download icon at the top of the list.
step.info: The report opens in a new window as a PDF and is downloaded onto your device. You can create a participant report multiple times during a meeting. Each report opens in a new windows. The name of the report is meeting_name_ date_attendance_time.

step.cmd: Close the window to close the report.
